author: markt
msg: Pausing the endpoint should not pause the poller. The poller needs to continue to operate to enable async, non-blocking I/O and HTTP/2 connections to complete.

author: markt
msg: Correct the description. This is the Poller, not the Acceptor.

author: markt
msg: Pausing the endpoint should not pause the poller. The poller needs to continue to operate to enable async, non-blocking I/O and HTTP/2 connections to complete.
